short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the number of days until Christmas

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply shows the number of days until Christmas. 

Feel the need to be constantly reminded of how far away Christmas is? Do you want to be able to check to see how many days until your family will get together and celebrate all of your favorite holiday traditions?

At different points in the year, different messages will show up regarding how far away Christmas is. 

This will work in any country, in any time zone and doesn't need access to the computers storage. 

This extension collects zero user data.
